resources.string: Hi I\’m Bodie Shane. I am a hard working teen who finishes what he starts. I always bring a good smile and positive attuned to the class. I work well with others.
My mom is a teacher so I have always had help with my homework. I work hard in all my classes and some how managing to balance clubs on top of it.
I love camp. I am a camp consular up at Camp Tuttle. games are fun but is nice to get away from games and just enjoy the camp fire. That and get paid.
I am a huge gamer I played games all the time growing up. To prove how much I am a geek I am missing 2 achievements on Skyrim. So that\’s what I do with my free time.
Took a food\’s class last year. I cook with my dad once a week. My grandmother also comes by to cook with me and make some sweat desert.
I joined robotic last year as a new student to school. I fell in love with the program after the first week. We ended up having the cheapest robot there but we still ended up in the top 50.
